whatever problems this game has right now, none of it is as bad as the ardent meta.
they now just need dont change everything for at least 2patchs
Season 8 isn't as good as 4 or 5, but its still a huge improvement from 6 and 7 so i really can't complain..

Season 4 start up to patch 4.20 was almost completely dominated by early game champs like Jayce,kha6 and oddly enough, Jinx too was OP at the time, post 4.20 it was a rework with feral flare and a ridiculous mess following that, but assassins got back once feral went down again. 

Then a tank meta, but before that a look at the other lanes...

Xerath and ziggs along with a few assassins were the midlaners, almost no others.

Riven and Renekton were the toplaners, as well as a few picks that work against them.....Toplane shyvana was a thing if i recall right.

Marksmen were lucian, jinx and tristana(for a time) and Draven along with Graves......basically early game bullies.

Season 5? Started off aggressively but aggression got nerfed along with assassins in general and jungler healthiness. 

That resulted in a full blown control mage meta midlane that lasted basically until assassin rework with few breaks in between.

Toplane liked beefy champs with damage like Darius/mundo, early game champs like Riven/renekton, teleport was a near "must pick" for all of them though, until cinderhulk hit. 

Marksman role was mostly unchanged and focused on early game bullies.

Jungle started off with divers like lee sin and jarvan but then Cinderhulk hit and tanks became the only junglers more or less.,,,,,or rather they took over all lanes. 

Then this all kept going until the juggernaut update, then we only had juggernauts.


What i am saying is, things werent all that great back then either, metas were often stale or completely dominated to the point were season 7 ardent+tank meta looked diverse.

I think your time stamps are a little off with the metas.. But i agree, there are always going to be issues with the game.. I'm just saying id take them over the ones we had in 6 and 7 .. and to some extent 8.. though it's no where near as bad as seasons 6 garbage dynamic Q and seasons 7 horrible reworks.

Season 7 reworks.......was that the the full WW, full galio, mini Azir, full eve an xin zhao change. 

Along with the overall tank update......urgot maybe?

Overall i dont think the Eve, warwick or Xin zhao were that bad, sure they came out overtuned like a lot of others but i do think the reworks ended up making them better.''


Galio, azir and urgot still ended up being kinda bad and the tank rework has in the end not really accomplished anything as i see it instead being just a waste of time aside from the items.

They were supposed to be changed from super durable generalist mountains that went around killing the glass cannons into slower but still highly durable and helpful&specialized champs with neat tricks like Zac ulti or Seju stun.

But it was botched due to gimmicks like Seju passive eating the power budget. 

Now? Like others seju has gotten durability nerfs repeatedly and now is getting damage buffs...... what was the point even'?

Well i do appreciate the effort but some things do really seem kinda pointless on their part <.<
